title: @Riot : Garens 5.16 Courage doesn't match what was promised on PBE
body:
From RiotRepertoir's posts:

PBE:

W - Courage
Armor/MR per kill 0.2 >>> 0.3
Armor/MR per Champion/LargeMonster/EpicMonster kill 1 >>> 0.3
Armor/MR cap per rank 10/15/20/25/30 >>> **30 all ranks**

later on 

W - Courage
Armor/MR stacking effect reduced to** .25 **from .3
Effectively requires 120 unit kills to be fully stacked now

From Lol's Wiki on PBE:

Courage
REMOVED: 20% armor and magic resist increase.
NEW PASSIVE: Unit kills permanently grant **0.25** Armor and Magic Resist, increased to 1 versus champions and large monsters. This bonus is capped at **30**.
Active no longer grants Tenacity.

from 5.16 Patch notes:

Passively, Killing units permanently grants** 0.2** Armor and Magic Resist (1 for kills on Champions, Large Monsters and Epic Monsters), up to a maximum of **10/15/20/25/30**




WTF is this travesty?
